1.content:
“Hey babe, I’m so excited to finally go on vacation!” Emily says.

“I know. To think in about 8 hours we will be in paradise.”

You and Emily were super excited to be on vacation. You had never been on vacation and knew that the possibilities were endless. You and Emily had been dating for a few years and thought it was time to go explore the world. Emily was a 5’ 3” blonde with a perfect body. A busty chest, wide hips, and her hair was down to her mid back. She has a cute face with a small nose, beautiful eyes, and a smile that could light up your world. You were so excited to finally be on vacation with her.

After 2 hours you and Emily got to the airport and were boarding the plane. The intercom came on and said, “Thank you for flying with BigSky flights, we are looking like we will have a great flight today and in 5 hours we should arrive at
1.title: Going on vacation

11.content:
Once you and Emily landed, you and her grabbed your bags and called an Uber.

“Welcome to Las Vegas folks! How are we doing?”

“Pretty good,” you respond.

“So how long are you guys here for?”

“5 days,” Emily answered.

“Oh very fun, you guys will love it here, it’s a big town.”

Once you and Emily arrived at the hotel, you and her went and put your bags away. There was so much to do in the town you couldn’t make up your mind. The top 5 things were
11.title: Las Vegas

114.content:
You two decided to go a magic show called, “Where’d she go?” It sounded like a cool show where this guy was able to make a girl disappear. It seemed straight forward and sounded fun. Once you and Emily arrived to the show to get tickets a man was going by talking on his cellphone. He stopped and looked at Emily and I.

“Hey can I call you right back? Okay. Bye,” he said while hanging up his phone, “Hey guys thanks for coming to the show.”

“And you are? I said.

“Oh sorry, I’m the magicians manager. Is this your guys first time to our show?”

“Yup, this is our first time in Las Vegas,” Emily blurted.

“Oh really? Well how would you like to be apart of the show? It’s really quite easy. You just sit on a chair in this box, we cover it up and then you “disappear” to the audience.”

“I’d love to,” Emily says.

“Awesome,” he said. “Hey, let these two in for free, they are coming with me,” he said to the ticket seller.

“Okay, enjoy the show,” the ticket seller said while smiling a bit weirdly.

Once you and Emily got back stage you saw the stage getting set up and then the main magician and his sidekick.

“This is Joshua and Brittany. They are the magicians.”

Joshua, had short brown hair, blue eyes, wasn’t super muscular, but overall was a good looking guy, he came up and looked Emily up and down. Then Brittany, blonde hair, a bit larger, wide hips, stunning eyes, and a confident smile eyed me up and down and winked.

“Perfect. She will do just fine,” Joshua said.

Confused as to what they meant you and Emily waited for further instruction. Pretty soon you heard the show start up. People were clapping, they had quite an audience. Not understanding how the trick was to be done you watched from the sides. That’s when they called Emily out onto the stage. Emily walked out and sat inside the box. After a while, Joshua covered up the box with a large dark sheet. Once this happened, a beam of light struck you. Rubbing your eyes you looked around. You were 1 inch tall, tiny, and you turned to see Brittany smiling at you, “come here little one.”

Worried for Emily you saw a small hint of a light flash in the box. They must’ve shrunk Emily. Not freaking out you asked if they were going to switch out Emily and you for the show act. Not saying a word Brittany ignored you. After about 1 minute they showed the box empty. Finally, after another 20 minutes the show was ended. Once everyone left you saw Joshua go in the box, bend down and pick something up. It had to be Emily. That’s when the manager met up with them. “Aight Joshua and Brittany, great show. It went perfect as it always does. You know what to do from here.”
114.title: Go watch a magic show

1141.content:
Joshua and Brittany smiles at each other and lifted you and Emily above their mouths. At the same time you and Emily see each other dropped into their mouths. Landing in Brittany’s saliva, her tongue kept pushing your around as your were sucked on. That’s when they opened their mouths to show me and Emily each other’s predicament.

Brittany mumbled, “Ready to watch her disappear?”

Emily was screaming and Joshua then said, “Oh she will come back, just out a different way. Hahahaha!”

With that you watched as his tongue moved Emily towards the back of his throat. And as soon as he dropped his tongue showing his throat, Emily slipped down. That’s when Brittany leaned her head back, shut he mouth, and you were swallowed whole. Inside her stomach it was moist, stinky, and stung your eyes. You tried pounding on the walls of her stomach only to get her stomach mucus barely on you. It was hours later that her body processed you and she shit you out before her next show. You never knew how Emily’s experience went, but you couldn’t imagine it was too different.
1141.title: Cheers

info.brief_description: You and your girlfriend go on vacation and things take a wrong turn!
info.description:
This story is designed to be fun, creative, and for people to make stories exciting.

Rules:

NO ONE WORD CHAPTERS

Try to leave an option for the character to keep living if you plan on killing them.

No extreme scat

No children

Try to stay realistic

No expansion or growth, only shrinking
